special_abilities.name: Two Heads
special_abilities.desc: The amphisbaena has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks and on saving throws against being blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, and knocked unconscious.

actions.description: The amphisbaena makes two bite attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 11 Constitution saving throw, taking 3 (1d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
actions.name: Bite

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: Bess can breathe air and water.

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 11). Bess has two claws, each of which can grapple only one target.
actions.name: Claw

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: The croaker can breathe air and water.

special_abilities.name: Speak with Frogs and Toads
special_abilities.desc: The croaker can communicate simple concepts to frogs and toads when it speaks in Bullywug.

special_abilities.name: Standing Leap
special_abilities.desc: The croaker's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

special_abilities.name: Swamp Camouflage
special_abilities.desc: The croaker has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in swampy terrain.

actions.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.
actions.name: Spear

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: The croaker sings a song of marshy doom. Each chosen creature within 30 feet of the croaker that can hear the song must make a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw, taking 9 (2d8) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature that fails this saving throw also has disadvantage on Constitution saving throws until the end of its next turn.
actions.name: Glaaar-pat (3/Day)

actions.description: The croaker sings an ode to an elder froghemoth. Each bullywug within 30 feet of the croaker that can hear the song gains 10 temporary hit points.
actions.name: Rooooo-glog (1/Day)

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: The royal can breathe air and water.

special_abilities.name: Brute
special_abilities.desc: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the royal hits with it (included in the attack).

special_abilities.name: Frog Rider
special_abilities.desc: The royal has advantage on melee attacks made while riding a frog mount.

special_abilities.name: Speak with Frogs and Toads
special_abilities.desc: The royal can communicate simple concepts to frogs and toads when it speaks in Bullywug.

special_abilities.name: Standing Leap
special_abilities.desc: The royal's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

special_abilities.name: Swamp Camouflage
special_abilities.desc: The royal has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in swampy terrain.

actions.description: The royal makes two attacks: one with its royal spear and one with its bite.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 10 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage, or 12 (2d8 + 3) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.
actions.name: Royal Spear

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: The royal makes a loud pronouncement. Each bullywug within 60 feet of the royal that can hear the pronouncement has advantage on its next attack roll.
actions.name: Croaked Decree (1/Day)

special_abilities.name: Divine Eminence
special_abilities.desc: As a bonus action, Xendros can expend a spell slot to cause its melee weapon attacks to magically deal an extra 10 (3d6) radiant damage to a target on a hit. This benefit lasts until the end of the turn. If Xendros expends a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the extra damage increases by 1d6 for each level above 1st.

spellcasting.desc: Xendros is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). Xendros has the following cleric spells prepared:

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Mace

name: Drowned Ascetic
subtitle: Medium undead, chaotic evil
languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

special_abilities.name: Bottom Treader
special_abilities.desc: The drowned ascetic cannot swim, and it sinks to the bottom of any body of water. It takes no penalties to its movement or attacks underwater. It is immune to the effects of being underwater at a depth greater than 100 feet.

special_abilities.name: Bound Together
special_abilities.desc: The drowned ascetic shares its mind with every other drowned one within 1 mile of it, and can communicate its thoughts and observations to them instantaneously and without limitation.

special_abilities.name: Undead Fortitude
special_abilities.desc: If damage reduces the drowned ascetic to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the drowned ascetic drops to 1 hit point instead.

actions.description: The drowned ascetic makes three unarmed strikes.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or contract bluerot (see the "Bluerot" in notes).
actions.name: Unarmed Strike

reactions.name: Dexterous Target
reactions.desc: The drowned ascetic adds 3 to its AC against one ranged attack that would hit it. To do so, the drowned ascetic must see the attacker.

name: Drowned Assassin
subtitle: Medium undead, chaotic evil
languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

special_abilities.name: Bottom Treader
special_abilities.desc: The drowned assassin cannot swim, and it sinks to the bottom of any body of water. It takes no penalties to its movement or attacks underwater. It is immune to the effects of being underwater at a depth greater than 100 feet.

special_abilities.name: Bound Together
special_abilities.desc: The drowned assassin shares its mind with every other drowned one within 1 mile of it, and can communicate its thoughts and observations to them instantaneously and without limitation.

special_abilities.name: Undead Fortitude
special_abilities.desc: If damage reduces the drowned assassin to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the drowned assassin drops to 1 hit point instead.

actions.description: The drowned assassin makes two hand crossbow attacks or two dagger attacks. It can then take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or contract bluerot (see the "Bluerot" in notes).
actions.name: Hand Crossbow

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or contract bluerot (see the "Bluerot" in notes).
actions.name: Dagger

actions.description: The drowned assassin removes its mask, revealing its rotting face. Each creature of the assassin's choice within 30 feet of it that can see the assassin must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of its next turn.
actions.name: Reveal (1/Day)

name: Drowned Blade
subtitle: Medium undead, chaotic evil
languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

special_abilities.name: Bottom Treader
special_abilities.desc: The drowned blade cannot swim, and it sinks to the bottom of any body of water. It takes no penalties to its movement or attacks underwater. It is immune to the effects of being underwater at a depth greater than 100 feet.

special_abilities.name: Bound Together
special_abilities.desc: The drowned blade shares its mind with every other drowned one within 1 mile of it, and can communicate its thoughts and observations to them instantaneously and without limitation.

special_abilities.name: Undead Fortitude
special_abilities.desc: If damage reduces the drowned blade to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the drowned blade drops to 1 hit point instead.

actions.description: The drowned blade makes two rusted longsword attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or contract bluerot (see the "Bluerot" in notes).
actions.name: Rusted Longsword

name: Drowned Master
subtitle: Medium undead, chaotic evil
languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

special_abilities.name: Bound Together
special_abilities.desc: The drowned master shares its mind with every other drowned one within 1 mile of it, and can communicate its thoughts and observations to them instantaneously and without limitation.

special_abilities.name: Cold Aura
special_abilities.desc: At the start of each of the drowned master's turns, each creature within 5 feet of it takes 5 (1d10) cold damage. A creature that touches the drowned master or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 5 (1d10) cold damage.

special_abilities.name: Undead Fortitude
special_abilities.desc: If damage reduces the drowned master to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the drowned master drops to 1 hit point instead.

actions.description: The drowned master makes two attacks: one with its greatsword and one with its Life-Draining Tentacle.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage plus 14 (4d6) cold damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or contract bluerot (see the "Bluerot" in notes).
actions.name: Greatsword

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or have its hit point maximum reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. On a failed save, the target also contracts bluerot (see the "Bluerot" in notes).
actions.name: Life-Draining Tentacle

actions.description: The drowned master discharges foul ink in front of itself in a 30-foot cone. Each creature caught in the ink must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 27 (6d8) necrotic damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature that fails this saving throw is blinded until the end of its next turn and contracts bluerot (see the "Bluerot" in notes).
actions.name: Necrotic Ink (Recharge 5-6)

special_abilities.name: Water Breathing
special_abilities.desc: The fish can breathe only underwater.

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of its next turn. On a failed save, the target begins to hallucinate and is afflicted with a short-term madness effect (determined randomly or by the DM; see "Madness" in chapter 8 of the Dungeon Master's Guide). The effect lasts 10 minutes.
actions.name: Bite

special_abilities.name: Water Breathing
special_abilities.desc: The eel can breathe only underwater.

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d10 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.name: Bite

special_abilities.name: Water Breathing
special_abilities.desc: The eel can breathe only underwater.

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.
actions.name: Bite

special_abilities.name: Luring Maestro
special_abilities.desc: While within 60 feet of the matriarch, creatures have disadvantage on saving throws against the matriarch's

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The matriarch has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.description: The matriarch makes two claws attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (3d6 + 3) slashing damage.
actions.name: Claws

actions.description: The matriarch can magically disguise itself to resemble a humanoid of roughly similar size and shape for up to 1 hour. It can revert to its true form as a bonus action. This illusion does not hold up to close scrutiny.
actions.name: Fleeting Form

actions.description:
The matriarch sings a magical melody. Every humanoid and giant within 300 feet of the matriarch that can hear the song must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or be charmed until the song ends. The matriarch must take a bonus action on its subsequent turns to continue singing. It can stop singing at any time. The song ends if the matriarch is incapacitated.
While charmed by the matriarch, a target is incapacitated and ignores the songs of other harpies. If the charmed target is more than 5 feet away from the matriarch, the target must move on its turn toward the matriarch by the most direct route, trying to get within 5 feet. It doesn't avoid opportunity attacks, but before moving into damaging terrain, such as lava or a pit, and whenever it takes damage from a source other than the matriarch, the target can repeat the saving throw. A charmed target can also repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns. If the saving throw is successful, the effect ends on it.
A target that successfully saves is immune to this matriarch's song for the next 24 hours.
actions.name: Luring Song

actions.description: The matriarch projects a vision into the minds of creatures within 30 feet of it that aren't constructs or undead, showing each creature achieving whatever it most desires. An affected creature must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or drop whatever it is holding and become paralyzed until the end of its next turn.
actions.name: Visage of Desire (1/Day)

name: Juvenile Kraken
subtitle: Huge monstrosity(titan), chaotic evil
languages: Abyssal, Celestial, Infernal, Primordial, telepathy 60 ft. but can't speak

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: The kraken can breathe air and water.

special_abilities.name: Freedom of Movement
special_abilities.desc: The kraken ignores difficult terrain, and magical effects can't reduce its speed or cause it to be restrained. It can spend 5 feet of movement to escape from nonmagical restraints or being grappled.

actions.description: The kraken makes two tentacle attacks, each of which it can replace with a use of Fling.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description:
Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 20 (3d8 + 7) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature grappled by the kraken, that creature is swallowed and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the creature is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the kraken, and it takes 21 (6d6) acid damage at the start of each of the kraken's turns. One Medium or two smaller creatures can be swallowed at the same time.
If the kraken takes 35 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the kraken must succeed on a DC 23 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in spaces within 10 feet of the kraken. If the kraken dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse using 10 feet of movement, exiting prone.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (3d6 + 7) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 20). Until the grapple ends, the target is restrained. The kraken has ten tentacles, each of which can grapple one target.
actions.name: Tentacle

actions.description: One Medium or smaller object held or creature grappled by the kraken is thrown up to 40 feet in a random direction and knocked prone. If a thrown target strikes a solid surface, the target takes 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage for every 10 feet it was thrown. If the target is thrown at another creature, that creature must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or take the same damage and be knocked prone.
actions.name: Fling

actions.description: The kraken magically create a bolt of lightning, which can strike a target the kraken can see within 90 feet of it. The target must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
actions.name: Lightning Strike

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: The koalinth can breathe air and water.

special_abilities.name: Martial Advantage
special_abilities.desc: Once per turn, the koalinth can deal an extra 7 (2d6) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the koalinth that isn't incapacitated.

actions.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage, or 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.
actions.name: Trident

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: The koalinth can breathe air and water.

special_abilities.name: Martial Advantage
special_abilities.desc: Once per turn, the sergeant can deal an extra 7 (2d6) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the sergeant that isn't incapacitated.

actions.description: The sergeant makes two melee attacks with its trident.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.
actions.name: Trident

actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 10/30 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage, and the target is restrained. A creature can use its action to make a DC 12 Strength check to free itself or another creature in a hooked net, ending the effect on a success. Dealing 5 slashing damage to the net (AC 12) frees the target without harming it and destroys the net.
actions.name: Hooked Net

reactions.name: Spear the Helpless (2/Day)
reactions.desc: Whenever a creature within 30 feet of the sergeant becomes restrained, the sergeant can move its speed toward the restrained creature. If the sergeant ends its move within reach of the restrained creature, it can make a melee attack against it.

spellcasting.desc: Krell is a 4th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following druid spells prepared:

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit (+4 to hit with shillelagh), reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage with shillelagh or if wielded with two hands.
actions.name: Quarterstaff

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: Kysh can breathe air and water.

special_abilities.name: Emissary of the Sea
special_abilities.desc: Kysh can communicate simple ideas with amphibious and water-breathing beasts. They understand the meaning of his words, but he cannot understand them in return.

spellcasting.desc: Kysh's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). He can cast the following spell, requiring only verbal components:

actions.description: Kysh makes two melee attacks with his spear.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft, one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.
actions.name: Spear

name: Living Iron Statue
subtitle: Medium construct, unaligned
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

special_abilities.name: Immutable Form
special_abilities.desc: The statue is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

actions.description: The statue makes two attacks: one with its blade and one with its hammer.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.
actions.name: Blade

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage, and the target is knocked prone.
actions.name: Hammer

actions.description: The statue can use its action to spin at the waist, targeting creatures of its choice within 10 feet of it. Each target must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 19 (3d10 + 3) bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
actions.name: Whirl (Recharge 5-6)

special_abilities.name: Hold Breath
special_abilities.desc: The lizardfolk can hold its breath for 15 minutes.

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.name: Bite

special_abilities.name: Blood Frenzy
special_abilities.desc: The render has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

special_abilities.name: Hold Breath
special_abilities.desc: The render can hold its breath for 15 minutes.

actions.description: The render makes two attacks: one with its claws and one with its bite.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) slashing damage.
actions.name: Claws

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: The render makes a claw attack against each creature of its choice within 10 feet of it. A creature hit by this attack must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.
actions.name: Rend the Field (Recharge 5-6)

special_abilities.name: Hold Breath
special_abilities.desc: The scaleshield can hold its breath for 15 minutes.

actions.description: The scaleshield makes two melee attacks, each one with a different weapon.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.name: Morningstar

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.name: Spiked Shield

reactions.name: Shield Block
reactions.desc: If an ally within 5 feet of the scaleshield is hit by an attack, the scaleshield can reduce that attack's damage by half.

special_abilities.name: Hold Breath
special_abilities.desc: The subchief can hold its breath for 15 minutes.

spellcasting.desc: The subchief is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following cleric spells prepared:

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.name: Tooth Dagger

actions.description: The subchief invokes the primal magic of Semuanya, summoning a spectral maw around a target it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (5d8) piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature that fails this saving throw is also frightened until the end of its next turn.
actions.name: Jaws of Semuanya (Recharge 5-6)

special_abilities.name: Leviathan Will
special_abilities.desc: The locathah has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, frightened, paralyzed, poisoned, stunned, or put to sleep.

special_abilities.name: Limited Amphibiousness
special_abilities.desc: The locathah can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

actions.description: The locathah makes two melee attacks with its spear.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage, or 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage if used with two hands.
actions.name: Spear

special_abilities.name: Leviathan Will
special_abilities.desc: The hunter has advantage on saving throws against spells and effects that control its actions.

special_abilities.name: Limited Amphibiousness
special_abilities.desc: The hunter can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

actions.description: The hunter makes two attacks with its envenomed crossbow.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d8 + 2) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the end of its next turn.
actions.name: Envenomed Crossbow

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Club

special_abilities.name: Divine Eminence
special_abilities.desc: As a bonus action, Refrum can expend a spell slot to cause its melee weapon attacks to magically deal an extra 10 (3d6) radiant damage to a target on a hit. This benefit lasts until the end of the turn. If Refrum expends a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the extra damage increases by 1d6 for each level above 1st.

spellcasting.desc: Refrum is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). Refrum has the following cleric spells prepared:

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Mace

special_abilities.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
special_abilities.desc: If the maw of Sekolah fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

special_abilities.name: Water Breathing
special_abilities.desc: The maw of Sekolah can breathe only underwater.

actions.description: The maw of Sekolah makes one attack with its bite and one attack with its tail smash.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) piercing damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

special_abilities.desc: The salvager can breathe air and water.

reactions.name: Flying Shards
reactions.desc: In response to a creature hitting the statue with a melee weapon attack, the statue deals 11 (2d10) piercing damage to the attacker.

name: Monstrous Peryton
subtitle: Large monstrosity, chaotic evil
languages: understands Common and Elvish but can't speak

special_abilities.name: Flyby
special_abilities.desc: The peryton doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

special_abilities.name: Keen Sight and Smell
special_abilities.desc: The peryton has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight or smell.

special_abilities.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
special_abilities.desc: If the peryton fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.description: The peryton makes two attacks: one with its gore and one with its talons.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) piercing damage.
actions.name: Gore

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) slashing damage.
actions.name: Talons

actions.description: The peryton chooses up to three creatures within 60 feet of it that it can see. Each creature must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or become cursed. While cursed, whenever the creature makes an attack roll, an ability check, or a saving throw, it must roll a d4 and subtract that number from the roll. A cursed creature can repeat this saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself with a success. A creature that succeeds on this saving throw is immune to this peryton's Warp Shadow for 24 hours.
actions.name: Warp Shadow

name: Mr. Dory
subtitle: Medium aberration, chaotic evil
languages: Abyssal, Common, Deep Speech, telepathy 60 ft.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: Mr. Dory has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

special_abilities.name: Water Dependency
special_abilities.desc: Mr. Dory takes 6 (1d12) acid damage at the end of every hour he goes without exposure to water.

spellcasting.desc: Mr. Dory's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (save DC 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). Mr. Dory can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

actions.description: Mr. Dory makes three attacks with his rapier.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) piercing damage and 7 (2d6) necrotic damage.
actions.name: Rapier

actions.description: Mr. Dory glares at a creature he can see within 30 feet of him. The target must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, it takes 27 (5d10) necrotic damage and 27 (5d10) poison damage and then gains vulnerability to both necrotic and poison damage for 1 minute. On a successful save, it takes half damage and does not gain the vulnerabilities.
actions.name: Eye of Corruption (Recharge 5-6)

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: Oceanus can breathe air and water.

special_abilities.name: Friend of the Sea
special_abilities.desc: Using gestures and sounds, Oceanus can communicate simple ideas with any beast that has an innate swimming speed.

special_abilities.name: Blood Frenzy
special_abilities.desc: The deep diver has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

special_abilities.name: Brine Lurker
special_abilities.desc: The deep diver has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made while submerged in water.

special_abilities.name: Limited Amphibiousness
special_abilities.desc: The deep diver can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

special_abilities.name: Lure
special_abilities.desc: The deep diver can cause its lure to light up or darken at will. While the lure is lit, the deep diver sheds bright light in a 30-foot radius centered on itself and dim light for an additional 20 feet.

special_abilities.name: Shark Telepathy
special_abilities.desc: The deep diver can magically command any shark within 120 feet of it, using a limited telepathy.

actions.description: The deep diver makes two attacks with its glaive, or one attack with its bite and two with its claws.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d10 + 2) slashing damage.
actions.name: Glaive

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage.
actions.name: Claws

actions.description: The deep diver pulses magical light from its lure. Any creature within 30 feet of the deep diver that can see the light must succeed on a DC 11 Wisdom saving throw or be charmed until the end of its next turn. A creature charmed in this way is incapacitated as it stares at the light.
actions.name: Light of Sekolah

special_abilities.name: Blood Frenzy
special_abilities.desc: The swarm has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

special_abilities.name: Seething
special_abilities.desc: Once it enters combat, the swarm deals 10 slashing damage to itself at the end of its turn if it did not make an attack on that turn. This damage ignores resistance, and it cannot reduce the swarm to 0 hit points.

special_abilities.name: Swarm
special_abilities.desc: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and it can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny creature. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

special_abilities.name: Water Breathing
special_abilities.desc: The swarm can breathe only underwater.

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 0 ft., one creature in the swarm's space. Hit: 14 (4d6) piercing damage, or 7 (2d6) piercing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.
actions.name: Bites

special_abilities.name: Blood Frenzy
special_abilities.desc: The wave shaper has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

special_abilities.name: Limited Amphibiousness
special_abilities.desc: The wave shaper can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

special_abilities.name: Shark Telepathy
special_abilities.desc: The wave shaper can magically command any shark within 120 feet of it, using a limited telepathy.

spellcasting.desc: The wave shaper's spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). It can cast the following spells, requiring only verbal components:

actions.description: The wave shaper makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d8 + 1) piercing damage plus 13 (3d8) cold damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d8 + 1) slashing damage plus 13 (3d8) cold damage.
actions.name: Claws

actions.description:
The wave shaper targets a body of water at least 50 feet square and 25 feet deep, causing a whirlpool to form in the center of the area. The whirlpool forms a vortex that is 5 feet wide at the base, up to 50 feet wide at the top, 25 feet tall, and lasts for 1 minute or until the wave shaper is incapacitated. Any creature or object in the water and within 25 feet of the vortex is pulled 10 feet toward it. A creature can swim away from the vortex by succeeding on a DC 14 Strength (Athletics) check.
When a creature enters the vortex for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there, it must make a DC 14 Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 9 (2d8) bludgeoning damage and is caught in the vortex until it ends. On a success, the creature takes half damage and isn't caught in the vortex. A creature caught in the vortex can use its action to try to swim away from the vortex as described above, but it has disadvantage on the Strength (Athletics) check to do so.
The first time each turn that an object enters the vortex, the object takes 9 (2d8) bludgeoning damage. This damage occurs each round it remains in the vortex.
actions.name: Whirlpool (1/Day)

Each creature within 10 feet of the juggernaut must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 18 (4d8) bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature that fails this saving throw is also knocked prone.
